text: Lɨhavɨci Jisasɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ abɨci fi hɨvɨ mɨgahɨnevɨmalɨ. Mɨgahɨnevɨdaci Jisasɨ maci mɨdɨŋ human limu sɨkuala human limu akica cɨjɨŋ haman agɨladɨ vica Asɨ dɨ ukaci uamalɨ. Asɨ dɨ ukaci ua maci mɨdɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨŋa sɨkɨ sɨkɨ lɨca kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlasaŋ labɨla labɨla saŋ nudɨ kulemɨlɨ agɨlasaŋ igumalɨ. Iguci kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlasaŋ labɨlavɨmalɨ.
